name: One Birthday
description:
One Birthday is about a couple celebrating each other's birthday.

This was one of the games I made way back 2014. I found it in my mediafire acc and it might be a little too cliche now but still gonna share anyway.

I can't find the files for this one since this is an old project OvO);
I can't remember why I made this. x'D
If there are some typos and stuff, I'm really sorry.

This one' really short like 10 seconds? Idk x'D
